verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H8123><s%> Samson עַזָּ֑תָה <S%H5804><s%> to Gaza וַיַּרְא־ <S%H7200><s%> and saw שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> ess זוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2181><s%> commit fornication וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and went in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> to

לַֽעַזָּתִ֣ים ׀ <S%H5841><s%> [And it was told] the Gazites לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> is come שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H8123><s%> Samson הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וַיָּסֹ֛בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> hither And they compassed [him] in וַיֶּאֶרְבוּ־ <S%H693><s%> and laid wait ל֥וֹ כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלַּ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> for him all night בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיִּתְחָרְשׁ֤וּ <S%H2790><s%> and were quiet כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <S%H3915><s%> all the night לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until א֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> when it is day הַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> In the morning וַהֲרְגְנֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> we shall kill

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> lay שִׁמְשׁוֹן֮ <S%H8123><s%> And Samson עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> half הַלַּיְלָה֒ <S%H3915><s%> night וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <S%H6965><s%> and arose בַּחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> half הַלַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night וַיֶּאֱחֹ֞ז <S%H270><s%> and took בְּדַלְת֤וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors שַֽׁעַר־ <S%H8179><s%> of the gate הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city וּבִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and the two הַמְּזוּז֔וֹת <S%H4201><s%> posts וַיִּסָּעֵם֙ <S%H5265><s%> and went away עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> along הַבְּרִ֔יחַ <S%H1280><s%> with them bar וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and all and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כְּתֵפָ֑יו <S%H3802><s%> [them] upon his shoulders וַֽיַּעֲלֵם֙ <S%H5927><s%> and carried them up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> up רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> to the top הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> of an hill אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] before חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> Hebron פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass afterward כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> this וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <S%H157><s%> that he loved אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> a woman בְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> in the valley שֹׂרֵ֑ק <S%H7796><s%> of Sorek וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> whose name דְּלִילָֽה׃ <S%H1807><s%> [was] Delilah

וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> came up אֵלֶ֜יהָ <S%H413><s%> about סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> And the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיֹּ֨אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> unto her and said לָ֜הּ פַּתִּ֣י <S%H6601><s%> unto her Entice אוֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> וּרְאִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> him and see בַּמֶּה֙ <S%H4100><s%> where כֹּח֣וֹ <S%H3581><s%> strength גָד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> wherein his great וּבַמֶּה֙ <S%H4100><s%> and how נ֣וּכַל <S%H3201><s%> [lieth] and by what [means] we may prevail ל֔וֹ וַאֲסַרְנֻ֖הוּ <S%H631><s%> against him that we may bind לְעַנֹּת֑וֹ <S%H6031><s%> him to afflict וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> we נִתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> him and we will give לָ֔ךְ אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thee every one אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> hundred כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [pieces] of silver

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דְּלִילָה֙ <S%H1807><s%> And Delilah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> to Samson הַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> Tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> where כֹּחֲךָ֣ <S%H3581><s%> strength גָד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> me I pray thee wherein thy great וּבַמֶּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> is and how תֵאָסֵ֖ר <S%H631><s%> [lieth] and wherewith thou mightest be bound לְעַנּוֹתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6031><s%> to afflict

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> And Samson אִם־ <S%H518><s%> to her If יַאַסְרֻ֗נִי <S%H631><s%> unto her If they bind בְּשִׁבְעָ֛ה <S%H7651><s%> me with seven יְתָרִ֥ים <S%H3499><s%> withs לַחִ֖ים <S%H3892><s%> green אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not חֹרָ֑בוּ <S%H2717><s%> that were never dried וְחָלִ֥יתִי <S%H2470><s%> then shall I be weak וְהָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> and be like כְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and be as another הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> man

וַיַּעֲלוּ־ <S%H5927><s%> brought up לָ֞הּ סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> Then the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines שִׁבְעָ֛ה <S%H7651><s%> to her seven יְתָרִ֥ים <S%H3499><s%> withs לַחִ֖ים <S%H3892><s%> green אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not חֹרָ֑בוּ <S%H2717><s%> which had not been dried וַתַּאַסְרֵ֖הוּ <S%H631><s%> and she bound בָּהֶֽם׃

וְהָאֹרֵ֗ב <S%H693><s%> Now [there were] men lying in wait יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> abiding לָהּ֙ בַּחֶ֔דֶר <S%H2315><s%> with her in the chamber וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him פְּלִשְׁתִּ֥ים <S%H6430><s%> unto him The Philistines עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <S%H8123><s%> [be] upon thee Samson וַיְנַתֵּק֙ <S%H5423><s%> And he brake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְתָרִ֔ים <S%H3499><s%> the withs כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יִנָּתֵ֤ק <S%H5423><s%> is broken פְּתִֽיל־ <S%H6616><s%> as a thread הַנְּעֹ֙רֶת֙ <S%H5296><s%> of tow בַּהֲרִיח֣וֹ <S%H7306><s%> when it toucheth אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> was not נוֹדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> was not known כֹּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3581><s%> So his strength

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דְּלִילָה֙ <S%H1807><s%> And Delilah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> unto Samson הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold הֵתַ֣לְתָּ <S%H2048><s%> Behold thou hast mocked בִּ֔י וַתְּדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> me and told אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about כְּזָבִ֑ים <S%H3576><s%> fail עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now הַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> now tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please לִ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> how תֵּאָסֵֽר׃ <S%H631><s%> me I pray thee wherewith thou mightest be bound

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אָס֤וֹר <S%H631><s%> unto her If they bind יַאַסְר֙וּנִי֙ <S%H631><s%> me fast בַּעֲבֹתִ֣ים <S%H5688><s%> ropes חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2319><s%> with new אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> accomplish בָהֶ֖ם מְלָאכָ֑ה <S%H4399><s%> been used וְחָלִ֥יתִי <S%H2470><s%> then shall I be weak וְהָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> and be like כְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and be as another הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> man

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> therefore took דְּלִילָה֩ <S%H1807><s%> Delilah עֲבֹתִ֨ים <S%H5688><s%> ropes חֲדָשִׁ֜ים <S%H2319><s%> new וַתַּאַסְרֵ֣הוּ <S%H631><s%> and bound בָהֶ֗ם וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him therewith and said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him פְּלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <S%H6430><s%> unto him The Philistines עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H8123><s%> [be] upon thee Samson וְהָאֹרֵ֖ב <S%H693><s%> And [there were] liers in wait יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> abiding בֶּחָ֑דֶר <S%H2315><s%> in the chamber וַֽיְנַתְּקֵ֛ם <S%H5423><s%> And he brake מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from זְרֹעֹתָ֖יו <S%H2220><s%> them from off his arms כַּחֽוּט׃ <S%H2339><s%> like a thread

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דְּלִילָ֜ה <S%H1807><s%> And Delilah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <S%H8123><s%> unto Samson עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Up הֵ֜נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hitherto הֵתַ֤לְתָּ <S%H2048><s%> thou hast mocked בִּי֙ וַתְּדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> me and told אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about כְּזָבִ֔ים <S%H3576><s%> fail הַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> tell לִּ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> how תֵּאָסֵ֑ר <S%H631><s%> me wherewith thou mightest be bound וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תַּאַרְגִ֗י <S%H707><s%> unto her If thou weavest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֛בַע <S%H7651><s%> the seven מַחְלְפ֥וֹת <S%H4253><s%> locks רֹאשִׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> of my head עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמַּסָּֽכֶת׃ <S%H4545><s%> with the web

וַתִּתְקַע֙ <S%H8628><s%> And she fastened בַּיָּתֵ֔ד <S%H3489><s%> [it] with the pin וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him פְּלִשְׁתִּ֥ים <S%H6430><s%> unto him The Philistines עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <S%H8123><s%> [be] upon thee Samson וַיִּיקַץ֙ <S%H3364><s%> And he awaked מִשְּׁנָת֔וֹ <S%H8142><s%> out of his sleep וַיִּסַּ֛ע <S%H5265><s%> and went away אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> out הַיְתַ֥ד <S%H3489><s%> with the pin הָאֶ֖רֶג <S%H708><s%> of the beam וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הַמַּסָּֽכֶת׃ <S%H4545><s%> and with the web

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> unto him How תֹּאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> canst thou say אֲהַבְתִּ֔יךְ <S%H157><s%> I love וְלִבְּךָ֖ <S%H3820><s%> thee when thine heart אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> for זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> these שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> me these three פְּעָמִים֙ <S%H6471><s%> times הֵתַ֣לְתָּ <S%H2048><s%> [is] not with me? thou hast mocked בִּ֔י וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <S%H5046><s%> and hast not told לִּ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> where כֹּחֲךָ֥ <S%H3581><s%> strength גָדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> me wherein thy great

וַ֠יְהִי <S%H1961><s%> came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when הֵצִ֨יקָה <S%H6693><s%> And it came to pass when she pressed לּ֧וֹ בִדְבָרֶ֛יהָ <S%H1697><s%> with her words כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> him הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> him daily וַתְּאַֽלֲצֵ֑הוּ <S%H509><s%> and urged וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <S%H7114><s%> was vexed נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> him [so] that his soul לָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> unto death

וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> That he told לָ֣הּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> her all לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> her all his heart וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָהּ֙ מוֹרָה֙ <S%H4177><s%> a razor לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has never עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> unto her There hath not come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשִׁ֔י <S%H7218><s%> upon mine head כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נְזִ֧יר <S%H5139><s%> for I [have been] a Nazarite אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> unto God אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I מִבֶּ֣טֶן <S%H990><s%> womb אִמִּ֑י <S%H517><s%> from my mother's אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If גֻּלַּ֙חְתִּי֙ <S%H1548><s%> if I be shaven וְסָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> will go מִמֶּ֣נִּי <S%H4480><s%> then כֹחִ֔י <S%H3581><s%> then my strength וְחָלִ֥יתִי <S%H2470><s%> from me and I shall become weak וְהָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> and be like כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> and be like any [other] man

וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <S%H3381><s%> came down אֶחָ֜יו <S%H251><s%> Then his brethren וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the house אָבִיהוּ֮ <S%H1><s%> of his father וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> and took אֹתוֹ֒ <S%H853><s%> וַֽיַּעֲל֣וּ ׀ <S%H5927><s%> him and brought [him] up וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <S%H6912><s%> and buried אוֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> between צָרְעָה֙ <S%H6881><s%> him between Zorah וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between אֶשְׁתָּאֹ֔ל <S%H847><s%> and Eshtaol בְּקֶ֖בֶר <S%H6913><s%> in the buryingplace מָנ֣וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> of Manoah אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שָׁפַ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> And he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years פ
